```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(shiny)
library(plotly)

mpv_data =
  read_csv("./data/mpv_final.csv") %>% 
  select()
```

Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
years = mpv_data %>% distinct(year) %>% pull()

# selectInput widget
selectInput(
  "year_choice", 
  label = h3("Select year"),
  choices = years, selected = "2013")

renderPrint({ 
  input[["year_choice"]]
})



max_price = 1000
min_price = nyc_airbnb %>% distinct(price) %>% min()
  
# sliderInput widget
sliderInput(
  "price_range", 
  label = h3("Choose price range"), 
  min = min_price, max = max_price, value = c(100, 400))


room_choice = nyc_airbnb %>% distinct(room_type) %>% pull()

# radioButtons widget
radioButtons(
  "room_choice", 
  label = h3("Choose room type"),
  choices = room_choice, selected = "Entire home/apt")
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(shiny)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  out.width = "90%"
)

theme_set(theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))

options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis"
)

scale_colour_discrete = scale_color_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d
```
